job.description: A workflow that accesses the specified folder in the mailbox to review each email, saving in a list of HashMap only the header details, such as the **From**, **To**, **Date**, **Has\_Attachment**, **Subject**, and **MsgNum**, etc. MsgNum contains the email index, which can be used when calling the Imap_Email_Fetcher task.
